key_features: 5 main tabs: Summary, Timeline, Team, Stats, Audit
Loading and error states with Skeleton and EmptyState components
API integration using apiClient for /projects/{projectId}/overview endpoint
Responsive grid layouts with MUI Grid system

file_insights.changes: Route definition added for new overview page
Existing overview page possibly refactored or merged with new implementation
Status updated from task 017-1-2 to task 058, session 8 to session 6, phase updated to 'Frontend Page - Overview Page Implementation'
Task-specific path permissions updated to reflect new task directory structure

patterns_discovered.description: Implementation uses ProjectOverviewTabs to manage 5 different content sections (Summary, Timeline, Team, Stats, Audit) with conditional rendering based on activeTab state
patterns_discovered.benefit: Allows users to quickly switch between different project overview perspectives without page navigation

patterns_discovered.description: Component uses useState for loading, useEffect for API calls, and displays Skeleton components during data loading
patterns_discovered.benefit: Provides visual feedback to users during data retrieval, improving perceived performance

patterns_discovered.description: Implements try-catch blocks with Toast notifications for errors and EmptyState component for no-data scenarios
patterns_discovered.benefit: Graceful degradation and clear user feedback on failures

patterns_discovered.description: Uses Card component wrappers for different data sections with consistent typography and spacing patterns
patterns_discovered.benefit: Visual consistency and easy content separation

patterns_discovered.description: Defines TypeScript interfaces for ProgressMetrics, TeamStats, ProjectStats, and ProjectOverviewData
patterns_discovered.benefit: Type safety and clear API contract definition

patterns_discovered.description: Uses MUI Grid with responsive breakpoints (xs={12}, md={6}) for mobile-first design
patterns_discovered.benefit: Mobile and desktop optimization without separate components

gotchas_discovered.description: Component imports from '../../../../../src/components/ui/Card' and '../../../../../components/ProjectProgressRing' suggesting inconsistent component directory structure
gotchas_discovered.recommendation: Standardize component import paths - consider either consolidating under src/components/ or clarifying the directory structure

gotchas_discovered.description: Route parameter destructured as 'projectId' but URL pattern uses '[id]', suggesting potential mismatch
gotchas_discovered.recommendation: Verify that useParams correctly maps [id] to projectId - may need to use { id: projectId } = useParams()

gotchas_discovered.description: API call assumes /projects/{projectId}/overview endpoint exists but backend implementation not verified in this session
gotchas_discovered.recommendation: Ensure backend API endpoint is implemented and returns all required data structures (progress, timeline, team_stats, project_stats)

gotchas_discovered.description: useEffect has [projectId] as dependency but doesn't handle case where projectId changes mid-session
gotchas_discovered.recommendation: Add cleanup or cancellation logic if needed, consider adding shouldRefetch logic

gotchas_discovered.description: Git diff shows truncated file content (30309 chars total) - audit tab content and other sections not visible
gotchas_discovered.recommendation: Verify full component implementation matches spec requirements, especially audit section

approach_outcome.summary: Successfully created comprehensive project overview page with tabbed interface and multiple data visualizations
key_accomplishments: Implemented new overview page component with full TypeScript support
Created 5 functional tabs (Summary, Timeline, Team, Stats, Audit) with conditional content rendering
Integrated API client for data fetching with proper error handling
Added loading states with Skeleton components for better UX
Implemented responsive grid-based layouts for multiple screen sizes
Created comprehensive data visualization components (progress rings, timeline, team stats)
Added Toast notifications for user feedback
Defined clear TypeScript interfaces for type safety

recommendations.recommendation: Resolve import path inconsistency - create unified component structure. Choose either src/components/ or components/ as single source of truth
recommendations.rationale: Multiple relative import paths suggest component organization needs standardization for maintainability

recommendations.recommendation: Verify /projects/{projectId}/overview backend endpoint implementation and test response structure against defined interfaces
recommendations.rationale: Component depends on specific API response structure - backend must match interface definitions

recommendations.recommendation: Test and verify route parameter mapping between [id] in URL pattern and projectId in useParams destructuring
recommendations.rationale: Parameter naming mismatch could cause runtime errors when accessing projectId

recommendations.recommendation: Add comprehensive unit tests covering: loading states, error states, empty states, tab switching, and API error scenarios
recommendations.rationale: Complex component with multiple data flows and error paths requires thorough test coverage

recommendations.recommendation: Consider implementing data caching or react-query for overview data to avoid unnecessary refetches when navigating between tabs
recommendations.rationale: Currently refetches entire dataset every time projectId changes, could impact user experience

recommendations.recommendation: Add JSDoc comments for component props, interface definitions, and complex rendering logic
recommendations.rationale: Complex component structure benefits from clear inline documentation for future maintenance

recommendations.recommendation: Review truncated diff to ensure Audit tab implementation is complete and functional
recommendations.rationale: Diff was truncated - need to verify all 5 tabs have complete implementations
